strings.STR_COMPLETE_MISSION_1_PERFECT: Complete Mission 1 with a 3 Star rating
strings.STR_COMPLETE_MISSION_2_PERFECT: Complete Mission 2 with a 3 Star rating
strings.STR_COMPLETE_MISSION_WITHOUT_POWERUP: Complete a Mission without using a Power-Up
strings.STR_DESTROY_10_ENEMIES_WINGMEN: Destroy 10 Enemies with the Blue Squadron Power-Up
strings.STR_DESTROY_20_ENEMIES_WINGMEN: Destroy 20 Enemies with the Blue Squadron Power-Up
strings.STR_DESTROY_50_ENEMIES_WINGMEN: Destroy 50 Enemies with the Blue Squadron Power-Up
strings.STR_DESTROY_100_ENEMIES_WINGMEN: Destroy 100 Enemies with the Blue Squadron Power-Up
strings.STR_DESTROY_10_ENEMIES_ROCKET: Destroy 10 Enemies with the Rocket Power-Up
strings.STR_DESTROY_20_ENEMIES_ROCKET: Destroy 20 Enemies with the Rocket Power-up
strings.STR_DESTROY_50_ENEMIES_ROCKET: Destroy 50 Enemies with the Rocket Power-Up
strings.STR_DESTROY_100_ENEMIES_ROCKET: Destroy 100 Enemies with the Rocket Power-Up
strings.STR_DESTROY_10_ENEMIES_BLASTER: Destroy 10 Enemies with the Blaster cannon Power-Up
strings.STR_DESTROY_20_ENEMIES_BLASTER: Destroy 20 Enemies with the Blaster cannon Power-Up
strings.STR_DESTROY_50_ENEMIES_BLASTER: Destroy 50 Enemies with the Blaster cannon Power-Up
strings.STR_DESTROY_100_ENEMIES_BLASTER: Destroy 100 Enemies with the Blaster cannon Power-Up
strings.STR_ACHIEVE_50000_SIMULATION_MODE: Achieve a score of 50000 in Simulation Mode
strings.STR_ACHIEVE_25000_SIMULATION_MODE: Achieve a score of 25000 in Simulation Mode
strings.STR_ACHIEVE_15000_SIMULATION_MODE: Achieve a score of 15000 in Simulation Mode
strings.STR_ACHIEVE_5000_SIMULATION_MODE: Achieve a score of 5000 in Simulation Mode
strings.STR_ENDLESS_CHANGE_LOCATION_10: Change location 10 times in Simulation mode
strings.STR_ENDLESS_CHANGE_LOCATION_50: Change location 50 times in Simulation mode
